verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paramu digenu mahima nindenaalo Siluva yodda swastata kaligenu Naa papam kadigenu raathri pagalai maarenu Paramu digenu mahima nindenaalo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ha! enta adbutaashcharya dinamu ennadu maruvani dinam Ne chikatilo thiriginapudu yesu nannu sandinche Ha! entha jaaligala mitrudu hrudaya akkarateerchenu Maranachchaayalu poye mudamuna telipeda cheekatinanta baapen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddha aatmatho janminchiti devuni gruhamandu Calvari premache kalge neethi oh entha ounnatyamu Theermaanam jarige vegamugaa papigaa nenu raagaa Krupaniche daani ne sweekarinchagaa rakshinchenu stotramu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nischayamuga paramandunna kaalamu theeragane Bhavanamulu naakandunnavani stiramugane nammudun Nammi siluvane cherina naade adiye adbuthadinam Nithyaiswarya mee deevenalu ponditi prabhu hastamunundi{/lang-eng}
